content.text: {"anomaly_score": 0.85, "explanation": "High anomaly score due to temporal proximity of password change and large fund transfer ($15,000) to an unknown PayID recipient. The sequence of events (password update at 09:12 followed by large transfer at 09:38) indicates potential account takeover. While the customer has high digital literacy and a low risk profile, the behavior pattern deviates significantly from normal activity patterns, especially considering the transaction occurred to an unknown recipient immediately after credential changes."}
